name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ミョスガルド

keyMoments.title: Donquixote Mjosgard Arrives at Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: World Noble Donquixote Mjosgard crashes on Fish-Man Island as the sole survivor of his wrecked ship. He arrogantly demands help while shooting at citizens and ordering his former slaves to return to servitude.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a character who will undergo one of the most dramatic redemptions in the series, transforming from a cruel Celestial Dragon to a champion of Fish-Man rights.
keyMoments.quote: Bring me a mask and a doctor immediately! You fish should be grateful a World Noble graces your pathetic island!

keyMoments.title: Saved by Queen Otohime
keyMoments.description: When former slaves attempt to assassinate him, Otohime shields Mjosgard with her body, saving his life despite being shot herself.
keyMoments.significance: This act of selfless compassion plants the seed for Mjosgard's eventual transformation. Otohime's sacrifice will profoundly impact his worldview.

keyMoments.title: Mjosgard Takes Otohime Hostage
keyMoments.description: After being saved, Mjosgard shows no gratitude and instead takes Otohime hostage at gunpoint, declaring her inferior despite being a queen.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the deep-rooted arrogance and cruelty of the Celestial Dragons, making his later redemption all the more remarkable.
keyMoments.quote: Even if you're a queen, you're still just a fish! You're all beneath me!

relationships.description: Otohime saved Mjosgard's life when he crashed on Fish-Man Island, despite him being a Celestial Dragon who had enslaved fish-men. Her mercy and compassion will later transform him completely.

evolutionMoments.description: Otohime shields Mjosgard from assassination, getting wounded in the process.

reveals.information: Member of the Donquixote Family of World Nobles
Was traveling to Fish-Man Island to reclaim slaves who escaped

keyMoments.title: Otohime Saves Mjosgard from Assassination
keyMoments.description: Queen Otohime throws herself in front of World Noble Mjosgard to shield him from bullets fired by former slaves seeking revenge. She is wounded but saves his life.
keyMoments.significance: This is the defining moment of Otohime's character and philosophy - risking her life to save an oppressor to break the cycle of hatred. It represents the ultimate expression of her pacifist ideals.
keyMoments.quote: I understand your pain! I can feel it! But we cannot let our hatred and resentment be passed on to the children! If we do, it will never end!

keyMoments.title: Otohime Decides to Travel to Mary Geoise
keyMoments.description: After Mjosgard is healed, Otohime makes the bold decision to accompany him to the surface world to negotiate with the Celestial Dragons and prove that peaceful coexistence is possible.
keyMoments.significance: This dangerous journey represents Otohime's ultimate commitment to her dream. It will lead to her obtaining signatures for the petition but also sets up the tragedy of her assassination.
keyMoments.quote: I will go to the surface with him. This is our chance to show that we can live together in peace!

abilities.description: Otohime possesses an extremely powerful form of Observation Haki that allows her to sense and feel the emotions of others with extraordinary intensity.

relationships.description: Otohime is the wife of King Neptune and Queen of the Ryugu Kingdom.
Otohime is the mother of Princess Shirahoshi and deeply loves and protects her daughter.
Otohime saved Mjosgard's life and showed him compassion despite him being a Celestial Dragon oppressor. Her mercy transforms him.

evolutionMoments.description: Otohime shields Mjosgard from assassination and later travels with him to Mary Geoise.

reveals.information: Her intense empathy allows her to feel the pain and emotions of others
Willing to risk her life to save even her people's oppressors to break the cycle of hatred

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Summons Sea Kings for the First Time
keyMoments.description: When young Shirahoshi sees her mother in danger, she screams in terror. Her cry summons five massive Sea Kings that emerge near Fish-Man Island, revealing her power as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.
keyMoments.significance: This is one of the most important reveals in One Piece - Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon with the power to command Sea Kings. This ability is crucial to the series' endgame and explains why she's been pursued.

abilities.description: Shirahoshi possesses the ability to communicate with and command Sea Kings, making her the Ancient Weapon Poseidon. At age 6, she cannot control this power and summons them unconsciously when emotional.

relationships.description: Shirahoshi deeply loves her mother Queen Otohime. Her fear for her mother's safety triggers her power.

evolutionMoments.description: Shirahoshi's scream for her mother reveals her power as Poseidon.

relationships.description: After witnessing her power, Vander Decken IX becomes obsessed with Shirahoshi as the legendary mermaid princess.

evolutionMoments.description: Decken realizes Shirahoshi is the mermaid princess his ancestor sought.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon with the ability to command Sea Kings
First manifestation of her Sea King summoning ability at age 6

keyMoments.title: Sun Pirates Return After Jinbe Becomes Shichibukai
keyMoments.description: Following Jinbe's acceptance as a Warlord of the Sea, the Sun Pirates officially disband and return to Fish-Man Island as free citizens with amnesty for their past crimes.
keyMoments.significance: Jinbe's new status as Shichibukai grants freedom to the former slaves of the Sun Pirates, representing a major step toward peace and reconciliation.

bounties.reason: Bounty frozen due to Shichibukai status

relationships.description: Jinbe respects Queen Otohime's dream of peace and his acceptance as Shichibukai supports her cause.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe's Shichibukai status grants amnesty to the Sun Pirates, supporting Otohime's peace efforts.

reveals.information: Officially becomes a Shichibukai, granting amnesty to the Sun Pirates

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken IX Realizes Shirahoshi is the Legendary Mermaid Princess
keyMoments.description: Witnessing Shirahoshi summon the Sea Kings, Vander Decken IX realizes she is the legendary mermaid princess who can control Sea Kings - the being his ancestor spent his entire life searching for.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation explains Decken's obsessive pursuit of Shirahoshi and sets up his role as an antagonist. It connects the ancient Vander Decken legend to current events.
keyMoments.quote: So she's the one... The mermaid princess who can command the Sea Kings! The legend my ancestor searched for his entire life!

relationships.description: After discovering Shirahoshi is the legendary mermaid princess who can command Sea Kings, Vander Decken IX becomes obsessed with possessing her and her power.

evolutionMoments.description: Decken realizes Shirahoshi is Poseidon and begins his pursuit.

reveals.information: Seeks Shirahoshi because she is the mermaid princess his ancestor searched for

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody Jones Witnesses Shirahoshi's Power
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones observes from afar as Shirahoshi summons the Sea Kings, witnessing the power of the Ancient Weapon. This knowledge will factor into his later schemes.
keyMoments.significance: This moment plants the seeds for Hody's plans involving Shirahoshi and shows how different characters react to the same revelation with different intentions.

reveals.information: Learns that Shirahoshi can command Sea Kings
